sentences: We are a fast growing staircase manufacturer with a fantastic opportunity available to join our team!
Working alongside our senior Developer, we are looking for someone to support our Team on a range of exciting new projects
Our ideal candidate is enthusiastic, eager to learn, and has the ability to quickly pick up new skills
You will be challenged daily in an exciting and ever-changing environment, and will work alongside colleagues in all areas of the business, and will be able to make a real difference to the company
Maintain our existing systems, learning from them at the same time
Implement design changes and new features
Has strong knowledge of JavaScript, MySQL, HTML, PHP (version 7 and 8)
A minimum of 1 year commercial experience
Has worked with and improved legacy code
Experience using frontend frameworks such as Vue
Ability to resolve problems and apply code to business processes
Enthusiasm for the role and software development in general
Thrives in a challenging and fast-paced environment
Resilient and maintains a positive attitude at all times
Hours of work: 8:00am - 5:00pm Monday to Friday
Stoke-on-Trent: reliably commute or plan to relocate before starting work (required)
segment: Has strong knowledge of JavaScript, MySQL, HTML, PHP (version 7 and 8)
A minimum of 1 year commercial experience
